name: EventHeldItemChange
description: This event is fired when the item stack in the player's main hand or off-hand changes.
overview: Fires when the item in main hand or off-hand changes. Triggers on swap, consume, drop, hotbar scroll. `offHand` is false for main hand changes, true for off-hand changes. Item helpers may be empty when the hand is empty. Not cancellable.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
